channel.title: War Rock Politics Politic Iraq Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: A simulation..
item.description: A simulation of war with IRAQ. RULE. I have always loved propaganda, but the whitehouse is dumb as rocks when it comes to this stupid war. Maybe more and more people are paying attention - we can only hope. It must be an accident. - Whee! I got my ipod today. it is incredible.
